tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with version control and basic structure.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository for the project. Set up the initial directory structure for frontend and backend components. Ensure that the repository includes a README file and a .gitignore file for Node.js projects.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository can be cloned and that the initial structure is correctly set up.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Develop user authentication system with 2FA support using NextAuth.js.
tasks.details: Use NextAuth.js to implement authentication. Configure providers for email/password and 2FA. Ensure secure storage of user credentials and session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for authentication flows. Perform manual testing to ensure 2FA works as expected.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Create the database schema using PostgreSQL and Prisma ORM.
tasks.details: Define tables for users, jobs, applications, and other entities. Use Prisma ORM to manage migrations and schema updates. Ensure relationships are correctly established.
tasks.testStrategy: Run migration scripts and verify schema in the database. Write tests to ensure data integrity and relationships.

tasks.title: Develop Job Search Feature
tasks.description: Implement advanced job search with filters and full-text search capabilities.
tasks.details: Use PostgreSQL full-text search and Prisma to implement search functionality. Add filters for location, salary, company, and skills. Ensure search is performant and accurate.
tasks.testStrategy: Write integration tests for search functionality. Validate search results against expected outcomes.

tasks.title: Build User Profile Management
tasks.description: Develop user profile management including resume upload and dashboard.
tasks.details: Create user profile pages with forms for updating information. Implement file upload handling for resumes using Next.js API routes. Ensure data is saved correctly in the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform unit and integration tests for profile updates. Verify file uploads are stored securely and can be retrieved.

tasks.title: Implement Job Posting and Management
tasks.description: Develop job posting and management features for employers.
tasks.details: Create forms and API routes for job posting. Implement job management dashboard for employers. Ensure data validation and error handling are robust.
tasks.testStrategy: Write tests for job posting and management workflows. Validate data integrity and user permissions.

tasks.title: Develop AI-Powered Job Recommendations
tasks.description: Create AI-powered job recommendation engine based on user profiles.
tasks.details: Use machine learning models to analyze user profiles and job data. Implement recommendation algorithms and integrate with the job search interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test recommendation accuracy and relevance. Use A/B testing to compare with non-AI recommendations.

tasks.title: Set Up Analytics and Monitoring
tasks.description: Integrate analytics and monitoring tools for user behavior and performance tracking.
tasks.details: Integrate PostHog and Google Analytics for tracking user interactions. Set up dashboards for monitoring key metrics and performance indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data collection and reporting accuracy. Perform tests to ensure analytics events are triggered correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Employer Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop analytics and reporting dashboard for employers.
tasks.details: Create dashboard components to display job performance metrics. Use data visualization libraries to present analytics clearly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard functionality and data accuracy. Validate visualizations against raw data.

tasks.title: Integrate Stripe for Payments
tasks.description: Implement Stripe integration for subscription-based pricing tiers.
tasks.details: Set up Stripe API for handling payments. Implement subscription management and billing features. Ensure secure transaction processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform end-to-end tests for payment workflows. Validate subscription management and billing accuracy.

tasks.title: Develop Resume AI Optimization Tools
tasks.description: Create AI tools for resume optimization and cover letter generation.
tasks.details: Implement machine learning models to analyze and optimize resumes. Develop cover letter generation algorithms. Integrate with user profile management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test optimization effectiveness and user satisfaction. Conduct user testing to gather feedback on AI-generated content.

tasks.title: Implement Content Management System
tasks.description: Develop CMS for managing regional landing pages, blogs, and FAQs.
tasks.details: Set up a content management system using Next.js. Implement features for creating and editing content. Ensure SEO optimization for all pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test content creation and editing workflows. Verify SEO metadata and page performance.

tasks.title: Develop Job Application Tracking
tasks.description: Implement job application tracking features for job seekers.
tasks.details: Create interfaces for tracking job applications. Implement backend logic to manage application statuses and notifications.
tasks.testStrategy: Test application tracking workflows. Validate notification delivery and status updates.

tasks.title: Set Up DevOps and Deployment
tasks.description: Configure Vercel deployment and DevOps processes for continuous integration and delivery.
tasks.details: Set up Vercel for deployment. Configure CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment. Ensure environment variables and secrets are managed securely.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify deployment processes and environment configurations. Test CI/CD pipeline for successful builds and deployments.

tasks.title: Conduct Security and Compliance Audits
tasks.description: Perform security audits and ensure compliance with GDPR and other regulations.
tasks.details: Conduct regular security audits to identify vulnerabilities. Ensure data handling complies with GDPR and other relevant regulations. Implement encryption and secure file handling practices.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform security testing and audits. Validate compliance through documentation and testing.
